pageContent: Purpose: To evaluate pre-operative prognostic risk factors to predict oncologic outcome of Salvage High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound (S-HIFU) for radiorecurrent prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
[Treatment of prostate cancer using cryoablation: a prospective study]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25799731/
